creditline: Gift of Douglas and Barbara Hedin in honor of Professor Thomas F. Hedin
description: cylindrical body, short neck; slightly ridged exterior, ridges deeper inside; horizontal stripes in blue, light blue, and grays on cream; raku technique; lid: circular; "bulls-eye" design painted on top in blues and grays
inscription:
Inscription
Scored into vase base: illegible characters (possibly initials, \"GN\") and [80]
title: Covered vase
